Introduction
This topic contains information on disposition of
VA Form 10-7131
requests and handing legacy NODs and appeals, including
disposition of a
VA Form 10-7131
after a dental rating decision
handling a legacy NOD when dental eligibility is at issue
, and
certifying a legacyÂ appeal to the Board of Veterans Appeals (BVA) when dental eligibility is at issue
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Processing Dental Claims
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B
